For "three times a lady", the period is 26 aug to 16 sep, which covers weeks starting 26 aug (week 34?), then 2 sep, 9 sep, and 16 sep—four weeks as well. So their weeks on top are separate; they don't overlap.

Therefore, the claim is FALSE because while both songs had four weeks at the top, these were not the same weeks. Each song topped the charts in different periods.
